results.name: Consumer Advertising Research Study
results.description: Hi there! We want to hear what you really think about ads you see every day. Your honest opinions will help brands make better ads that actually connect with people. No right or wrong answers‚Äîjust your genuine thoughts. Join us and share your voice!

results.name: Seeking Pet Owners for Exciting Study!
results.description: We are a qualitative research platform and we would like to speak to pet owners about products they use for their animal! If you qualify for the research study, we will send you a device that will track product usage from January 12th - February 9th. You will be asked to complete a few video recordings as well. We estimate that this study will take 110-minutes of your time for which you will receive $225.

results.name: Seeking creative professionals
results.description: We are a tech company working on innovative tools to dramatically transform the way we work in creative industries. We are developing new technologies that require us to know more about how creative industries work today, to help us meet their needs with our tools.

results.name: Talk Pets with Us: An AI-Moderated Interview for Pet Lovers
results.description:
Take a short survey about pet care experiences for a chance to join a follow-up study with rewards.

This interview uses AI moderation technology.

What's involved:
- Answer a set of engaging questions using your webcam
- Share your honest thoughts and experiences in your own words
- Participate at your convenience ‚Äî day or night, whenever fits your schedule

Why join?
- Your feedback will help brands better understand consumer habits
- No need to book a time slot ‚Äî it's fully flexible
- You'll receive a thank-you incentive for completing the interview
